Get In Touch

I'm always excited to discuss research ideas, potential collaborations, or opportunities in AI and multi-agent systems. Whether you're a fellow researcher, student, or industry professional, I'd love to hear from you!

Research Collaboration

I'm open to collaborations in the following areas:

  • Multi-agent reinforcement learning
  • Graph neural networks for robotics
  • Simulation environments and benchmarking
  • Real-world applications of multi-agent systems
  • Open-source tool development

If you're interested in collaborating, please include:

  • A brief description of your research background
  • The specific area of collaboration you're interested in
  • Your timeline and available resources
  • Any relevant publications or projects

Speaking & Presentations

I'm available for:

  • Conference keynotes and invited talks
  • University guest lectures
  • Industry workshops and seminars
  • Podcast interviews
  • Panel discussions

Popular talk topics include:

  • "The Future of Multi-Agent AI Systems"
  • "From Research to Reality: Deploying Multi-Agent Systems"
  • "Building Open-Source Tools for AI Research"
  • "Graph Neural Networks in Robotics"
  • "Career Paths in AI Research"
